EmailTemplate.description: Email to notify the field that a request was received and who is assigned.
EmailTemplate.name: WRF Auto Notification to Rep
EmailTemplate.subject: WRF Received Subject:{!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Case.WRF_Requestor_Name__c},
Thank you for your Work Request submission for {!Case.Account}. We appreciate the opportunity to work with you.
Your Support # is {!Case.CaseNumber} You can click here to view the request in Salesforce.com.
You will receive another communication as soon as a team has been assigned to your request.
Thank you,
Pricing & Profitability
